name: チルノ！バカの冒険
description:
THERE IS NO SUPPORT FOR ULTRAWIDE, PLEASE SET YOUR ASPECT RATIO TO 16:9 OR 16:10 BEFORE PLAYING.

This is the final project of my Object-Oriented Programming college subject. Have fun!

Cirno was bored, so she went to do what she does best: FREEZING SOME FROGS! However, Suwako doesn't seem happy about this...

Freeze some frogs in this high-score top down 2D shooter game!

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Shoot (you can hold this, btw)

Shift (hold) = Move slowly and see your hitbox

Source code can be found here. (FLOSS ROCKS!)

- Art assets (sprites, animations, main menu, buttons, background etc.) by Marilia Dauer <3 - Instagram // Twitter

- Title screen font

- Buttons font

- Menu SFX by SubspaceAudio

- Bullet Hell Engine using Unity's particle system by Mairon

- SFX by OSA

- BGM by Wingless Seraph

- Music loop base code by Andrew Mushel

- Scrolling Background base code by Caio Flávio

- Health Bar code by Wayra Codes

- JSON base code by Kee Gamedev
